VideoGames is the corner of Everything2 where we node about and discuss the world of [video games] - everything from [video games|the games themselves] to [Video Games Platforms|the technology behind them] to [Video Games Characters|the characters depicted within them]. There's also a lot of discussion in the group, but moreso about news in the industry and not so much about "How do I beat the Silver Flame Dragon at the end of the Space Zone?". Consider joining us if you want to talk games, [E2 FAQ: Video Games|node games], or just [*ify! FAQ|be alerted] whenever a new game-related writeup hits E2.

[{weblog}]
